value:
$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|What do you think of my egg,
Prince Xander?$k$pThe way it's painted, I think it's
cute...and pretty...maybe even
the most stylish egg here.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|That egg is gaud— I mean,
delightful.$k$pWho would think to put those
colors together? Very...
original.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|I'm glad you like it. You have a
reputation for having a fine
eye for beauty.$k$pHere, you can have it.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|How gracious of you, Princess
Lucina, but... Oh, look! We have
challengers among us.$k$pI'm eager to brandish my carrot
in battle. Let's get to fighting!$k

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|We have no choice but to retreat,
Princess Lucina.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|W-was it my egg? Maybe the
colors do clash a little...$k$Sbs150|
